place.name: LITTLETON
place.gazetteerText: LITTLETON, a parish in Winchester district, Hants; 3 ¼ miles NW by N of Winchester. Post town, Winchester. Acres, 1,293. Real property, £1,378. Pop., 109. Houses, 25. The property is divided among a few. Many race-horses are trained here; and the stables for them are extensive. The living is a p. curacy in the diocese of Winchester. Value, £76. Patrons, the Dean and Chapter of Winchester. The church is Norman and good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
